titles: The precepts of the excellent clerke [and] graue philosopher Plutarche for the preseruation of good healthe
author: Plutarch.
Hales, John, d. 1571.
notes: An translation, by John Hales, of: Plutarch.  De tuenda sanitate praecepta.
At foot of title page: Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
